About

ArcJ

This is the web page for the group ArcJ. We're on the Founders and Coders web dev course, and we'll be recording our progress, projects, thoughts and other things we find interesting here. You can find out more about us or our projects by clicking through the menu above.


Founders and Coders is a community of developers and a coding academy, running a 16 week intensive full-stack web-development course. Throughout the course ArcJ will be learning by building.

Useful things

Below are some things we find useful, or resources or links that we've come across that we think are awesome:


Founders and Coders

Codewars is a great place to practice your skills in various languages

Codeacedemy can help build your learning in new topics
